plot: Cartman is outraged when he is sent to fat camp by his mother. Meanwhile, Kenny becomes famous for a "Jackass" style TV show.

Cartman gets sent off to a fitness camp to lose weight and comes back to South Park not only much thinner, but also much more mature and good-natured. His friends appreciate the change at first but soon find themselves wanting the old Cartman back and becoming suspicious that the new one is not what he appears. Meanwhile, Kenny becomes a minor shock-celebrity after agreeing to perform a series of increasingly disgusting acts for money.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
